document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the Anthicidae and pediline Pyrochroidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) of Iran, with thirteen new country records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the Anthicidae and pediline Pyrochroidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) of Iran, with thirteen new country records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Published data. Iran (Uhmann et al . 2005, as both
Hirticolles [sic!] hispidus
&
H . jacqueti
, general distribution; Сhandler et al . 2008, as both
Hirticollis hispidus
&
H . jacqueti
, checklist); East Azarbaijan (Atamehr et al . 2004); Ilam, Lorestan, Mazandaran (Uhmann 1985, as
H. jacqueti
); Tehran (Uhmann 1985, as
H. jacqueti
; Uhmann 1988 ); Albroz Mts. (
Uhmann 1996, as
H. jacqueti
);

New records.
